language_select: Choose your language, you can choose from seven different languages.
language_confirm: The language has just been updated.
no_sms_permission: The application hasn't received the permission to send SMS.
request_sms_permission: You must allow the application to send SMS to make it work.
no_contacts_permission: The application hasn't received the permission to access to the contacts.
request_contacts_permission: You must allow the application to access to the contacts to make it work.
